data.text: @pp12 Hi, I'm sorry your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to baggage claims. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@jingle2shoes Hi Gillian, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Is there anything we can assist you with? If you are referring to an already existing reservation please send us the booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Chris

please send us your booking code.

data.text:
@struga131 (1/2) Dear John,
We're sorry your mother's flight has been canceled. Our teams are doing everything they can to offer alternative options for you and minimize the impact on your travel plan. Send us your booking reference via DM along with as much information as possible so
@MajaCellist Hi Maja, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane

@JillOBr99019114 Dear Jill,
I would like to sincerely apologize for the flight cancellation. Kindly note that if you have incurred any expenses during the delay you may apply for compensation via the following link: 
https://t.co/lQ0BbSodym
Kind Regards, Alessandra

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @ncmart Hi Nick, how can we assist you? Please also send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Funda
@FelixArtner Hallo Felix, können wir etwas für dich tun? Bitte gib uns den Buchungscode und die gewünschten Flugdaten. Gerne schauen wir uns das an. Liebe Grüße, Funda

@sellisrev Hi Serge, I'm sorry you didn't reach our colleagues at the Customer Service Center. There are many calls at the moment. You would like to cancel extra luggage? Please send us your booking code, and we will have a closer look. Kind regards, Sarah

@NathanHowells92 Hi Nathan, I am very sorry that you haven't receive an reply yet. I would like to refer you to our Terms and Conditions of Carriage - Article 3.1.2. "The Ticket is not transferable." Kind regards, Funda

@NathanHowells92 Hi Nathan, as already mentioned the ticket cannot be transferred to another person. A name change is not possible. We can only see if a refund is possible according to the booked tariff regulations. Please send us the booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Derya

@NathanHowells92 [2/2] Under certain conditions (typing error up to 2 letters or a change of surname due to marriage, etc...) a name correction against EUR/USD 25 (or equivalent in local currency effective of the day of payment) is allowed. Kind regards, Derya

data.text:
@NathanHowells92 [1/2]Hi Nathan, thank you for reaching out. We are sorry to hear that your request is still pending. I gladly inform you:
A change of name is not permitted according to Austrian Airlines policy.

@Quigslootplay Hi Mona, we are very sorry for any inconvenience caused by the cancelation of your flight and understand your anger. Please submit a claim via the following link https://t.co/3zIxR1kVg1. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Enquiry about rebooking
urls.description: Have your travel plans changed? Get in touch – we are happy to check whether and on what conditions your ticket can be rebooked.

data.text: @MajaCellist Hi Maja, thank you for reaching out. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the cancelation. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya

@racheellee Hi Rachelle, are you at the airport? If so please contact a Lufthansa handling agent and they will issue you with a hotel voucher. If not you can book a hotel and submit the receipt via the following link: https://t.co/EbTmj25JcK Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Current information and flight irregularities
urls.description: Find out about current safety information and rules for travelling before you travel, and get flight information via text or email.

data.text: 3/3 Passengers are advised to check the status of their flight in advance on https://t.co/YLEBDoRZ3z. Customers who have booked through an (online) travel agency are asked to contact the respective travel agency. We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience.
2/3 Affected passengers who have given their telephone number or e-mail address as well as Miles & More members will be informed proactively about changes or rebookings.

1/3 The works councils for flying & commercial/technical staff are planning works meetings at Vienna Airport on June 2. Therefore, delays and flight cancellations will occur on the evening of June 1 & on June 2.

@Croatan315 Hi Junica, we cannot offer any discount but you can find all our current offers on our homepage and our upgrade options can be found here: https://t.co/zX66cT1Yae We hope you have a great first flight with us. Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Upgrades
urls.description: Find out here about all the options for booking an upgrade. Well in advance or at short notice - you decide.

data.text: @twin_karla Hi Karla, please click "after flight" and then feedback. Kind regards, Christine

@twin_karla Hi Karla, please accept our apology for all the trouble during your journey. In order to assist your further, please be so kind and fill up the online form on our webpage by using the following link https://t.co/XiuZ6tGSxr Best regards, Shawn
@j05h_hun570n Hi Josh, please send us your booking code and your new requested flights in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@mazydavy Hi David, We are sorry that you had difficulty contacting us by phone. Due to the current situation, unfortunately, all our channels are overloaded and there may be longer waiting times. Would you mind sending us your booking code via PM? 
Best regards, Shawn

@a1fellner [1] Hallo Fellner, vielen Dank für deine Nachricht. Gerne teilen wir dir mit, dass wir in unsere Business Klasse für die bevorzugten Sitzplätze eine Reservierung gegen eine Gebühr ermöglichen.
@a1fellner [2] Sehr gerne kann aber im Zuge des Check-Ins jeder freie Sitzplatz ausgewählt werden. Liebe Grüße, Shawn
@J05H_HUN570N Hi Josh, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@gelboron Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please send your request via impressum@austrian.com so that our responsible colleagues can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

Austrian Airlines and all the Lufthansa Group Airlines would like to wish a Happy International Flight Attendant Day to all Flight Attendants out there!🎊🌎🛩 #servus #austrian #internationalflightattendantday #letscelebrate https://t.co/aEWS4OtnxD

data.text: @NadiehClarkson Hi Nadieh, I assume strongly yes. Please get in contact with Schiphol Airport for exact information. Kind regards, Derya

@CarryOn90s @AoifeBu50027240 Hi, well no, we don´t offer non-stop flights to London Stansted. I´m sure when you click on search there would be no Austrian flight that can be selected. Kind regards, Derya
@gelboron Hi, have you tried to unsubscribe from the newsletter via your Miles & More profile? Kind regards, Sarah

@mazydavy [2/2] Our colleagues will be happy to help you. However, we ask for your understanding that there may be longer waiting times due to the enormous number of inquiries at the moment. Here are our worldwide contact numbers https://t.co/g6rO0i1tzZ. Kind regards, Derya

data.text:
@homeroomtravel Hi Francesca, we are really sorry for all the trouble. Regarding any compensation request, I have to ask you to send your claim via our webpage by using the following link https://t.co/1jYyfcuAde 
Best regards, Shawn

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@NadiehClarkson Hi Nadieh, thank you for choosing Austrian Airlines. If you are starting your journey from Vienna Airport, you'll definitely have the option to use the priority lane at the security.  
Best regards, Shawn

@AmelaOsmic Hi Amela, I am sorry that you are facing difficulties to reach our Customer Service Center. Please write an email to specialcases@austrian.com. Our colleagues will take care of your inquiry. Kind regards, Sarah
@AoifeBu50027240 Hi, I'm sorry to read about your sister. We do not offer flights from Stansted. Only from London. Kind regards, Sarah

@PriftiJorgo (2/2) that we are in full commitment for you and we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again.
Best regards, Alessandra

@homeroomtravel [2] Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests.
Best regards, Shawn

@homeroomtravel [1] Hi Francesca, we are sorry for the delay with your luggage and the inconvenience this must have caused. Have you filed a delayed luggage report? If not you can do so here: https://t.co/KIMN0tJ0Dk
@mzschaemisch Hi, please send us your booking code in a PM and we will take a look for you.  Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6SOY0

@BailyRichard @londonheathrow Hi Richard, have you tried Boots? Boots at Heathrow normally sell them - it will just depend whether they are in stock. Our crew have a limited supply. Please bring a medical mask just in case you cannot get hold of an FFP2. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@No_C02 [2/2] As the 3 possibilities were only activated on 25.05 it is too early to say what people are choosing yet. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@No_C02 [1/2] Hi, we are committed to our goal of becoming carbon-neutral by 2050. The use of sustainable aviation fuel in our aircraft is just one of many levers to achieve this target. You can find out more on https://t.co/1AaYfKMfT0
@emusiclady Hi Alina, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@petersabaini In 2022 we are uplifting 1,500 tons of SAF in Vienna. We are working on continously increasing that amount.
@IAmDaniel_87 Hi, sollte es hier Änderungen geben, erfährst du diese direkt auf unserer Homepage. Liebe Grüße, Christine

@andruza Hello, we are currently experiencing an unusual increase in volume. We want you to know that this is not typical for the type of service we strive to provide our customers. You can send us your booking code in a DM, we'll try to help. 
Best regards, Alessandra
@DureinovicJ Hi Jelena, we're sorry for any issues with our form. Using a different browser may help. Please send your request to specialcases@austrian.com Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text:
2/2 “It will be easier for our guests to discover the world in a carbon-neutral way. We are the only Austrian airline using #SustainableAviationFuels to make carbon-neutral flying possible for our guests," says CCO Michael Trestl.

#MakeChangeFly #SAF

👇https://t.co/wO1j8olEZX

1/2 Fly carbon-neutral with us! ✈️♻️
We have integrated 3 possibilities for carbon-neutral air travel directly into the flight booking procedure at https://t.co/YLEBDoRZ3z. Our passengers can now choose between #SAF, climate protection projects or a combination of both. https://t.co/jP3CzqfrsE
@franz0rr [2] Meine Kollegen:Innen werden dir einen Essensvoucher ausstellen. Wir bedanken uns für  dein Verständnis. Liebe Grüße, Shawn

@franz0rr [1] Hallo Franz, wir entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände aufgrund der Verspätung. Wir bitten dich nochmals unsere Kollegen:Innen am Service Schalter F02 zu kontaktieren und Ihnen zu erklären, dass man den Voucher mit der Boardkarte nicht akzeptieren konnte.
@arnon86 [2/2] If you cannot get through at the moment, they will be in touch as soon as they can deliver. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@arnon86 [1/2] Hi Arnon, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately the Social media Team has no access to luggage claims. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter.

@homeroomtravel Hi Francesca, we are sorry for the delay to your luggage and the inconvenience this must have caused. Have you filed a delayed luggage report? If not you can do so here: https://t.co/KIMN0tJ0Dk Kind regards, Lyndsay

@siracha44058846 [2/2] on the instructions of the authorities. You can also find more information about international entry restrictions and Covid test requirements via https://t.co/ugM6XvfxRx Kind regards, Lyndsay

@siracha44058846 [1/2] Hi, passengers who are only changing flights at Vienna Airport (and are not entering Vienna) are generally governed by the relevant entry regulations of their country of origin. We as an airline, do not have special Covid test requirements, as we are dependent

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @ola_vino_tinto Hi there, I gladly inform you that the regulation for security checks is set by official authorities due to Schengen (Non-Schengen) Agreement ;-) It´s not an airline decision. Kind regards, Derya
@mikeflintgo Hi Mike, I'm sorry to hear your daughter's luggage wasn't duly delivered. Please send an email to our colleagues at viellos@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya
@lt8107 [2/2] The contact person there will be glad to assist you. For reimbursements please fill on our online form: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @jantonsson Hi JO Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay / Kind regards, Lyndsay
@jantonsson [2/2] We kindly ask you to keep the invoices and scan them for our colleagues using the following contact form: https://t.co/5lT6eOxRSk. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @jantonsson [1/2]Hi Jonas, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the delay with your baggage. I kindly inform you, that the cost of cosmetics is reimbursed at 100% and clothing at 50%.

@BCrane480 Hi Bradley, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We appreciate your continued patience. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@bzzzbip Hi Antonia, what error message did you receive? We just checked it with your booking code and it seemed to be working correctly. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@Justmunaz Hi Munna, we are waiting for an answer from the respective department and will reply to your message as soon as we hear back.  Kind regards, Lyndsay

@Justmunaz There may have been reasons why a second one was later free (e.g. flight delay).As an international company we strongly distance ourselves from any form of racism. Our staff is from all over the world and we cherish this multicultural climate very much.Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2]

@Justmunaz Hi Munna, one glass of still water is offered free of charge per person on short haul flights, a second one is normally chargeable. Please send us your flight details in a PM and we can look into the matter for you. [1/2] https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @MyGoGetta Hi there! We can´t set any actions in advance if your connecting time is not under the minimum connecting time which is 25 min at Vienna Airport. We can only offer you a rebooking according to your tariff regulations. Please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@Jas29512670 Hi Jas, thank you for reaching out. Should you miss your flight please contact our colleagues at our service center desks. They will assist you further. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@shaqsplace @staralliance @aegeanairlines Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Did you file a report already at your arrival station? Kind regards, Christine
@lprov35 Hi Lisa, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@magdalenalk8 Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@romain_robert Hi Romain, we are sorry to hear about your experience so far and can only apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/dAXMVijisj Kind regards, Chris
